resources.string:
we are pixectra 
									and
	 we make your memories 
						come to life.
upload upto 100 every month and get a photo book printed and mailed to you for 249 or order 20 freeprints.
every photobook comes with new cover\n \t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tand \nyou can have your own custom cover.
\t\t\t\t\t\t\tregister now\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t and\nget your first photobook \t\t\t\t\t\t\tfor free!
To see the welcome slider again, goto Settings -> apps -> welcome slider -> clear data
